sections.MISSION:
1/2CR Squadron Mortars conduct M4 ARM Training on 12 OCT 2023 IVO RG 126 in order enhance proficiency with a M4 and create more combat focused training
Commanderâ€™s
sections.PURPOSE: To provide more realistic M4 training for soldiers in the platoon to include ARM training and shooting moving targets. Incorporating more realistic, combat focused training with primary individual weapon.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Conduct M4 PMI
Conduct Zero and Standard M4 Qualification
Conduct ARM Training
Conduct a Mover Qualification
sections.END STATE:
MTR Platoon qualifies on their primary individual weapon and improved marksmanship with a more realistic training.
Training Objectives
Conduct M4 PMI
Conduct M4 TBL V and VI Qualification
Conduct ARM Training
Conduct a Mover Shooting Qualification
